title: Undekhi
overview: Show depicts the two aspects of the society - the power-drunk influential people who think they can get away with anything and the oppressed, subjected to years of torture, who finally decide to bring themselves to justice

tv.episodeTitle: That’s The Way The Cookie Crumbles
tv.episodeOverview: Old players reappear as do some new ones in this game of Russian roulette, where the stakes are higher than life itself. Each one has a motive to take down the other – driven by their thirst for power, revenge and love.
